verses.verse: Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> as <S%H7270>spies<s%> <S%H9178>secretly<s%> from <S%H7851>Shittim,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1980>"Go,<s%> <S%H7200>view<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H853>especially<s%> <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>" So they <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of a <S%H802>harlot<s%> <S%H2181><s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7343>Rahab,<s%> and <S%H7901>lodged<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And it was <S%H559>told<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H2008>here<s%> <S%H3915>tonight<s%> to <S%H2658>search<s%> out the <S%H776>land.<s%>"

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> [word] to <S%H7343>Rahab,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3318>"Bring<s%> out the <S%H376>men<s%> who have <S%H935>come<s%> to you, <S%H834>who<s%> have <S%H935>entered<s%> your <S%H1004>house,<s%> for they have <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H2658>search<s%> out <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>"

But the <S%H802>woman<s%> had <S%H3947>taken<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> and <S%H6845>hidden<s%> them, and she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H9210>"Yes,<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to me, but I did not <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H370>where<s%> they were from.

"And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when [it was time] to <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> at <S%H2822>dark,<s%> that the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out; I do not <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H575>where<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H1980>went.<s%> <S%H7291>Pursue<s%> them <S%H4118>quickly,<s%> for you will <S%H5381>overtake<s%> them."

But she had <S%H5927>brought<s%> them up to the <S%H1406>roof<s%> and <S%H2934>hidden<s%> them in the <S%H6086>stalks<s%> of <S%H6593>flax<s%> which she had <S%H6186>laid<s%> in <S%H6186>order<s%> on the <S%H1406>roof.<s%>

So the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> them on the <S%H1870>road<s%> to the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to the <S%H9278>fords;<s%> and as <S%H9201>soon<s%> as those who were <S%H7291>pursuing<s%> them had <S%H3318>gone<s%> out, they <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H8179>gate.<s%>
Now <S%H2962>before<s%> they <S%H7901>lay<s%> <S%H7901>down,<s%> she <S%H5927>came<s%> up to them on the <S%H1406>roof,<s%>

and <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H376>men,<s%> "I <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> you the <S%H776>land,<s%> and that the <S%H367>terror<s%> of you has <S%H5307>fallen<s%> on us, and that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> have <S%H4127>melted<s%> <S%H4127>away<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you.

"For we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H834>how<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3001>dried<s%> up the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220><s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you when you <S%H3318>came<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H834>what<s%> you <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> to <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> and <S%H5747>Og,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroyed.<s%>

"And when we <S%H8085>heard<s%> [it,] our <S%H3824>hearts<s%> <S%H4549>melted<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7307>courage<s%> <S%H6965>remained<s%> in <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5750>any<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of you; for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> He is <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> and on <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H4480>beneath.<s%> <S%H8478><s%>

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore, <S%H4994>please<s%> <S%H7650>swear<s%> to me by the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3588>since<s%> I have <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H2617>kindly<s%> with you, that you <S%H1571>also<s%> will <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H2617>kindly<s%> with my father's <S%H1004>household,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> me a <S%H226>pledge<s%> of <S%H571>truth,<s%>

and <S%H2421>spare<s%> my father and my <S%H1>mother<s%> and my <S%H517>brothers<s%> and my <S%H251>sisters,<s%> with <S%H269>all<s%> <S%H3605>who<s%> belong to them, and <S%H834>deliver<s%> our <S%H5337>lives<s%> from <S%H5315>death.<s%> "

So the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her, "Our <S%H5315>life<s%> for yours <S%H518>if<s%> you do not <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>business<s%> of ours; and it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> us the <S%H776>land<s%> that we will <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H2617>kindly<s%> and <S%H571>faithfully<s%> with you."

Then she <S%H3381>let<s%> them <S%H3381>down<s%> by a <S%H9112>rope<s%> <S%H1157>through<s%> the <S%H2474>window,<s%> for her <S%H1004>house<s%> was on the <S%H7023>city<s%> <S%H2346>wall,<s%> so that she was <S%H3427>living<s%> on the <S%H2346>wall.<s%>

And she <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H1980>"Go<s%> to the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> the <S%H7291>pursuers<s%> <S%H6293>happen<s%> upon you, and <S%H2247>hide<s%> yourselves <S%H8033>there<s%> for <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H7291>pursuers<s%> <S%H7725>return.<s%> Then <S%H310>afterward<s%> you may <S%H1980>go<s%> on your <S%H1870>way.<s%>"
And the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her, "We [shall be] <S%H9345>free<s%> from <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7621>oath<s%> to you <S%H834>which<s%> you have made us <S%H7650>swear,<s%>

<S%H2009>unless,<s%> when we <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H776>land,<s%> you <S%H7194>tie<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H9649>cord<s%> of <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H2339>thread<s%> in the <S%H2474>window<s%> through <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H3381>let<s%> us <S%H3381>down,<s%> and <S%H622>gather<s%> to yourself into the <S%H1004>house<s%> your father and your <S%H1>mother<s%> and your <S%H517>brothers<s%> and <S%H251>all<s%> your father's <S%H3605>household.<s%>

"And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about that <S%H3605>anyone<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3318>goes<s%> out of the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of your <S%H1004>house<s%> into the <S%H2351>street,<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> [shall be] on his own <S%H7218>head,<s%> and we [shall be] <S%H9345>free;<s%> but <S%H3605>anyone<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is with you in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> [shall be] on our <S%H7218>head,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> a <S%H3027>hand<s%> is [laid] on him.

"But <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>business<s%> of ours, then we shall be <S%H9345>free<s%> from the <S%H7621>oath<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have made us <S%H7650>swear.<s%>"

And she <S%H559>said,<s%> "According to your <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> be it." So she <S%H7971>sent<s%> them <S%H7971>away,<s%> and they <S%H1980>departed;<s%> and she <S%H7194>tied<s%> the <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H9649>cord<s%> in the <S%H2474>window.<s%>

And they <S%H1980>departed<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country,<s%> and <S%H3427>remained<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> for <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H7291>pursuers<s%> <S%H7725>returned.<s%> Now the <S%H7291>pursuers<s%> had <S%H1245>sought<s%> [them] <S%H3605>all<s%> along the <S%H1870>road,<s%> but had not <S%H4672>found<s%> [them.]

Then the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> and <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> and <S%H5674>crossed<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> and they <S%H5608>related<s%> to him <S%H3605>all<s%> that had <S%H4672>happened<s%> to them.

And they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H3588>"Surely<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> into our <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H1571>moreover,<s%> have <S%H4127>melted<s%> <S%H4127>away<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> us."
